auth.enterIdentifier: Enter your email or phone number
auth.enterCode: Enter the verification code sent to
auth.niceToHaveYou: Great to have you on board!

auth.invalidPhone: Saudi phone numbers must start with 05 and be 10 digits

auth.protectAccountDesc: We’ll send you a one-time passcode now and each time you log in to ensure that you’re the only one with access to your account.
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Enter the email address or phone number you used to register with.
auth.lostEmailOrPhone: Forgot or lost your email or phone number?
auth.otpLastAttempt: Incorrect code. Last attempt before lockout.
auth.otpLocked: Too many failed attempts. Try again in {{minutes}}:{{seconds}}.
auth.otpMaxResends: Maximum resend attempts reached. Please try again later.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passkeyFailed: Passkey authentication failed. Please try another sign-in method.

partners.heroTitle: Join our partner ecosystem to fuel your growth
partners.heroDesc: Berhot powers businesses worldwide with commerce solutions, making it the ideal partner for earning commissions, expanding your customer base, and entering new markets.
partners.chooseProgram: Choose the partner program perfectly tailored to you
partners.referDesc: Promote Berhot's commerce platform to your audience and get rewarded for every new user you bring on board.
partners.integrationDesc: Expand your reach to thousands of businesses by developing solutions that integrate with Berhot's commerce platform.
partners.perksDesc: A global network of partners and world-class resources are just the beginning. With Berhot, partnerships shift into high gear:
partners.perk1Desc: Berhot products are ideal for tech partnerships, offering speed, sophistication and cutting-edge product innovation.
partners.perk2Desc: Get featured and connect with more retailers looking for seamless solutions.
partners.perk3Desc: Benefit from some of the highest commission opportunities in the industry.
partners.perk4Desc: Get help from a partner manager. Benefit from in-depth training and 24/7 tech support.
partners.perk5Desc: Expand your reach with co-marketing, newsletter features, and a partner marketing toolkit.
partners.howPartner: How would you like to partner?
partners.successMsg: Application submitted successfully! We'll be in touch soon.
partners.errorMsg: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.notFoundDesc: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

signup.title: Let’s create your account
signup.subtitle: Signing up for Berhot is fast and free – no commitments or long-term contracts.
signup.termsPrefix: I have read and agree to Berhot’s
signup.recaptchaNotice: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA Enterprise and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.

signup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
signup.mustAgreeTerms: You must agree to the terms
